name: Royal Velvet Sherwani Set
description: Exude regal elegance in this handcrafted deep maroon velvet sherwani. Featuring intricate zardozi embroidery and antique gold button detailing, this ensemble includes a matching cream churidar and a silk stole. Perfect for weddings and grand festivities.

name: Pure Linen Hand-Loomed Kurta
description: Experience the breathable luxury of 100% European flax linen. This handcrafted white kurta features a mandarin collar and subtle mother-of-pearl buttons. Ideal for summer soirées or sophisticated casual wear.

name: Italian Wool Slim-Fit Suit
description: A masterpiece of tailoring, this charcoal grey suit is crafted from premium Italian Super 120s wool. Featuring a structured shoulder and modern slim lapel — perfect for corporate or cocktail events.

name: Kanjeevaram Silk Saree
description: A timeless heirloom, this authentic Kanjeevaram silk saree is woven with pure mulberry silk and rich zari. The emerald green body contrasts with a temple border, making it a stunning choice for bridal wear or traditional ceremonies.

name: Embroidered Bridal Lehenga
description: Step into a fairytale with this voluminous pastel pink lehenga. Adorned with delicate floral embroidery, sequins, and crystal work on soft net fabric, this set comes with a matching blouse and a sheer dupatta.

name: Midnight Velvet Evening Gown
description: Turn heads at any gala in this floor-sweeping midnight blue velvet gown with an off-shoulder neckline and dramatic side slit, balancing classic glamour with contemporary allure.

name: Festive Boys Kurta Jacket Set
description: Make your little one shine in this charming 3-piece set with a cotton silk kurta, churidar, and festive Nehru jacket with gold foil prints — soft, comfortable, and stylish.

name: Princess Tulle Party Dress
description: A dreamy tulle dress in powder blue with flower appliques and a cotton lining. Perfect for birthdays and celebrations where she can twirl in style.

name: Traditional Silk Pavadai Set
description: Authentic South Indian silk pavadai and top set with rich zari borders, lightweight and comfortable for festive days and celebrations.

name: Boys Dhoti Kurta Set
description: Traditional boys’ dhoti kurta set with delicate thread embroidery and comfy cotton fabric — perfect for pujas, Ganesh festival, or Navratri celebrations.
